movies.title: L.DK
movies.plot: Aoi Nishimori's parents moved to another city for work, but Aoi didn't want to transfer to a new high school. She stays behind and lives in an apartment by herself. Shusei Kugayama moves in next to Aoi's apartment. Shusei is a very popular student at their high school. Due to a mistake, Aoi makes the sprinkler go off in his room. Until Shusei's room is fixed, he stays with Aoi.
movies.simplePlot: Aoi lives in an apartment by herself. Shusei moves in next to Aoi's apartment. Shusei is a very popular student. Due to a mistake, Aoi makes the sprinkler go off in his room. Until his room is fixed, he stays with Aoi.

biography.bio: Kento Yamazaki was born on September 7, 1994 in Itabashi, Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Another (2012), Heroine Disqualified (2015) and Your Lie in April (2016).
biography.name: Kento Yamazaki

biography.bio: Ayame Gôriki is an actress, known for L.DK (2014), Black Butler (2014) and Teen Court (2012).
biography.name: Ayame Gôriki

biography.bio: Miho Shiraishi was born on August 8, 1978 in Hitachiomiya, Japan. She is an actress, known for Swing Girls (2004), Berna (2005) and Wakaretara sukina hito (2015).
biography.name: Miho Shiraishi

biography.bio: Anna Ishibashi is an actress, known for Paper Flower (2011), Your Friend (2008) and Milocrorze: A Love Story (2011).
biography.name: Anna Ishibashi

biography.bio: Ren Kiriyama is an actor, known for Kamen Rider W Forever: A to Z/The Gaia Memories of Fate (2010), Kamen Rider × Kamen Rider OOO & W Featuring Skull: Movie War Core (2010) and Ju-on: The Final Curse (2015).
biography.name: Ren Kiriyama

biography.bio: Rei Okamoto was born on June 18, 1991 in Wakayama, Japan. She is an actress, known for The Ramen Girl (2008), Kimi e no merodî (2010) and High School Debut (2011).
biography.name: Rei Okamoto

biography.bio: Akiyoshi Nakao is an actor, known for Time Traveller (2010), Ace Attorney (2012) and Rookies the Movie: Graduation (2009).
biography.name: Akiyoshi Nakao

biography.bio: Kent Yamazaki is an actor, known for Hyôka (2017), Jinkusu!!! (2013) and L.DK (2014).
biography.name: Kent Yamazaki

biography.bio: Seiji Fukushi is an actor, known for Your Friend (2008), Nodame Cantabile: The Movie I (2009) and Manmakoto: tatsunosuke Saiteicho (2015).
biography.name: Seiji Fukushi

biography.bio: Takeshi James Yamada is an actor, known for Tokyo Tribe (2014), L.DK (2014) and Kabadeen! Hanafubuki Kôkô hen (2014).
biography.name: Takeshi James Yamada
